page.title: 04INTERVIEW PARISH CHAIRMAN
page.content: { CALDECOTE,SMALL {VILLAGE,CAMBRIDGESHIRE { FROM PAGE 3 AND THEY BUILT THERE HOUESES OF WOOD AND CORRUGATED IRON AND THAT GRADULLY BECAME HIGHFIELDS AS WE KNOW. WITH A POPULATION OF 530. {HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN CHAIRMAN OF THE {PARISH COUNCIL? I HAVE BEEN CHAIRMAN FOR ABOUT 20 YEARS. {WHY DO YOU LIKE CALDECOTE? BECAUSE IT IS OPEN COUNTRY {DO YOU LIKE YOUR JOB AS CHAIRMAN OF {THE PARISH COUNCIL? YES,I LIKE IT VERY MUCH BECAUSE OF THE COMMUNITY SPIRIT IN THE VILLAGE. {WHAT DO YOU DO IN YOUR SPARE TIME? I HAVE NO SPARE TIME BUT MY TIME IS TAKEN UP WITH MY FAMILY,MY GARDEN,MY PETS AND VILLAGE AFFAIRS. { CON'T PAGE 5
